item.name: Step 2: (User fills form - No API call)

request.description:
üì± REACT NATIVE - REGISTRATION STEP 3

PURPOSE: Get subscription plans

WHEN TO CALL:
- After Step 2 form validation passes

WHAT TO DO:
1. Display plans in horizontal scroll or cards
2. Highlight popular plan (is_popular: true)
3. Show monthly vs yearly toggle
4. Display features list
5. Show capabilities badges (POS, Payroll, etc.)
6. Add "30 Days Free Trial" badge
7. Show terms & conditions checkbox
8. User taps plan ‚Üí checkbox ‚Üí Submit

UI EXAMPLE:
```tsx
<ScrollView horizontal>
  {plans.map(plan => (
    <TouchableOpacity
      key={plan.id}
      onPress={() => setSelectedPlan(plan.id)}
      style={[
        styles.planCard,
        plan.is_popular && styles.popularCard,
        selectedPlan === plan.id && styles.selectedPlan
      ]}
    >
      {plan.is_popular && (
        <View style={styles.popularBadge}>
          <Text>‚≠ê POPULAR</Text>
        </View>
      )}
      <Text style={styles.planName}>{plan.name}</Text>
      <Text style={styles.price}>
        {showYearly ? plan.formatted_yearly_price : plan.formatted_monthly_price}
        {showYearly && plan.yearly_savings_percent > 0 && (
          <Text style={styles.savings}>
            Save {plan.yearly_savings_percent}%
          </Text>
        )}
      </Text>
      
      <View style={styles.features}>
        {plan.features.map((feature, idx) => (
          <Text key={idx}>‚úì {feature}</Text>
        ))}
      </View>
      
      <View style={styles.capabilities}>
        {plan.capabilities.pos && <Badge>POS</Badge>}
        {plan.capabilities.payroll && <Badge>Payroll</Badge>}
      </View>
    </TouchableOpacity>
  ))}
</ScrollView>

<View style={styles.termsContainer}>
  <Checkbox
    value={acceptedTerms}
    onValueChange={setAcceptedTerms}
  />
  <Text>I agree to Terms & Conditions</Text>
</View>

<Button
  disabled={!selectedPlan || !acceptedTerms}
  onPress={handleRegister}
>
  Complete Registration
</Button>
```

RESPONSE FORMAT:
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Starter",
      "monthly_price": 500000,
      "formatted_monthly_price": "‚Ç¶5,000",
      "yearly_price": 5000000,
      "formatted_yearly_price": "‚Ç¶50,000",
      "yearly_savings_percent": 17,
      "features": ["Feature 1", "Feature 2"],
      "limits": {"max_users": 5, "max_customers": 100},
      "capabilities": {
        "pos": false,
        "payroll": false,
        "api_access": false
      },
      "is_popular": false
    }
  ]
}
```
